changelog.change_log:
- Significant improvements to the STF12 pump action shotgun. The pump will now lock in place while a shell is chambered and ready to fire. Other improvements to the overall feel.
- Significant improvements to the MR96 bolt and grips. It is now much harder to accidentally grab the magazine when reaching for the grip or bolt.
- Added a message of the day that appears once every play session until it is dismissed.
- Possible fix for the Hardpoint timer getting stuck.
- Visual improvements to Este's vista and misc. assets throughout the map.
- Misc. bug fixes and optimizations

Changes and Fixes
- Fixed issue causing players sometimes to appear invisible
- Updated Patreon list
- Map collision improvements
- Character Animation perf improvements
- Improving Gold Skins visually on Quest
- Reduced likelihood of guns getting stuck when grabbed off the weapon dispenser in Armory
- Reduced likelihood of guns getting stuck in walls when grabbing them off your chest
- There is a slight increase to bullet penetration damage on all rifles, SMGs, and pistols
- The knife now paints your friends
- Slightly improved map loading times (but more to come soon)
- New Impact Frag kill feed icon to differentiate it from a regular frag
- Fixed a few crashes affecting some players

See you all in-game!
[i]AEXLAB[/i]
